overview: In her small flat in Munich, Angelica lives an Elvis Presley-centered life, far away from the world, which she perceives as loud and bad sometimes. She spends from 600 to 700 Euros a month for Elvis fan stuff, but she only needs 20 Euros a week for food. The film is a portrait of a middle-aged woman, who wants to live as she wants to: with Elvis Presley.
title: Graceland
